Class Transferer

  • java.lang.Object
    • TicketManager
      • Transferer

  • public class Transferer
extends TicketManager
    Transferer Class Transferer manages the rescheduling of Tickets to a new show or a new seat

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class TicketManager

      • getTicketTransferSurcharge

        public float getTicketTransferSurcharge(java.lang.String ticketType)
        getTicketTransferSurcharge If there is a price increase during the ticket transfer, a surcharge is payable. If there is a price reduction, or the ticket price is the same, then there is no surcharge. Note: the cinema does not offer refunds if a ticket is transferred and the new seat is cheaper than the value of the ticket.
        Parameters:
        ticketType - String
        Returns:
        float

      • getSeatingGridIgnoreTicket

        public boolean[][] getSeatingGridIgnoreTicket(Ticket ignoreTicket)
        getSeatingGridIgnoreTicket Ignore one ticket. Get the proposed seating grid updated with the temporary seat reservations. One ticket will be ignored. This method is used when the seats are being selected for the ticket transfer
        Parameters:
        ignoreTicket - Ticket
        Returns:
        boolean[][]

      • getReservation

        public Reservation getReservation()
        getReservation Get the current seat reservation. This will return null if no seat reservation has been set
        Returns:
        Reservation

      • getSurcharge

        public float getSurcharge()
        getSurcharge if the new reservation is cheaper or the same price as the original ticket, set surcharge to 0.0. No refunds are given
        Returns:
        float
